name: Hypetrain Dilemma
description:
A maniac clown is on the lose and has rigged the roller coaster. Unfortunate people are falling out of the wagons and paint the park red! It is up to you to catch them by regulating the speed of the roller coaster. Save those People and most importantly save the amusement park´s money!

https://www.twitch.tv/soribus

Updated to 0.8 for fixing Gamebreaking bugs. This will be the last version for the gamejam

0.8.1: solved money bug after restarting game
